title: WALL-E
short_plot_summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot named WALL-E inadvertently embarks on a space journey that ultimately decides the fate of mankind and a polluted Earth.
explanation: A robot, representing WALL-E, the main character
A plant, symbolizing the sign of new life found by WALL-E
A rocket, representing the spaceship WALL-E and EVE board in search of humans
Earth, where WALL-E carried out his duties as a waste-collecting robot
A recycling symbol, indicating the movie's environmental message
